news.title: FCC Sued By Dozens of Cities After Voting to Kill Local Fees and Rules
news.description: An FCC vote to preempt local fees and rules related to cable-broadband providers has been challenged in federal court by almost 50 cities seeking to undo the order.

news.title: US Violated Constitution By Searching Phones For No Good Reason, Judge Rules
news.description: A federal court has concluded that ICE and border agents violated the 4th amendment when they searched the devices of 11 travelers without individualized suspicion.

news.title: Search Warrant Overrides 1M Users’ Choice Not to Share DNA With Cops
news.description: A Florida judge has approved a warrant that would disregard the preferences of over a million users of a consumer DNA database, allowing law enforcement to search all user data.

news.title: The Supreme Court Will Hear Google and Oracle’s Nearly Decade-Long Copyright Fight
news.description: The Court has confirmed that it will take up the years-long dispute between Google and Oracle regarding whether basic code elements can be copyrighted.
